BrooklineNewSchool group on Facebook

https://www.facebook.com/groups/BrooklineNewSchool/ is a new "open group" on Facebook with a title of "Public Discussion of Brookline's Plans for Creating a New School" and the following description

The purpose of this group is to provide discussion around possible scenarios for the next school in Brookline.

As of this writing it has 777 members.
